definition: Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
dialect/language/speech
to tell to
to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: In studying Chinese, one must first learn to distinguish between initial consonants and vowels.
sentences.chinese: 學習漢語拼音一定要先學會區分聲韻。

sentences.english: Oppositon to the use of Chinese Pinyin violates the common sense of linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 反對漢語拼音的言論違背語言學常識。

sentences.english: How Chinese Bopomofo affects your learning of English letters?
sentences.chinese: 漢語拼音字母對您學習英語字母有什麼影響？

sentences.english: Pinyin is a tool for learning or using Hanyu and Hanzi.
sentences.chinese: 漢語拼音是學習或者使用漢語和漢字的工具。

sentences.english: I was in primary school, the teachers teach us to learn Hanyu Pinyin.
sentences.chinese: 我在上小學時，老師教我們學習漢語拼音。

sentences.english: Also one hopes Hanyu Pinyin will stay frozen and not change with the language.
sentences.chinese: 另最好漢語拼音也不要跟著語音自然變遷而一直修正。

sentences.english: There are two forms of the Chinese phonetic alphabet, the cursive and the printed.
sentences.chinese: 漢語拼音字母有手寫體和印刷體兩種體式。

sentences.english: There is even fear of an unstated intention to replace Chinese characters totally, eventually.
sentences.chinese: 部分人士還擔心有一天方塊字會被漢語拼音完全取代。

sentences.english: The translation is faithful to the original version, and with emphasis on the rhymes, attached Chinese phonetic symbols.
sentences.chinese: 譯文既忠實原文，又注意韻味，並附有漢語拼音注音。

sentences.english: Hanyu Pinyin, Words Recognition, Reading Comprehension, Foundation Essay.
sentences.chinese: 漢語拼音，高頻字認讀，閱讀理解，基礎作文。

sentences.english: I can spell my name in Hanyu Pinyin , the Chinese phonetic alphabet .
sentences.chinese: 我能用漢語拼音拼出我的名字。

definition: Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
to spell
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
the Latin alphabet
phonetic symbol
simple versus traditional (Chinese characters)
variant Chinese character
standard form of a Chinese character/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
simplified Chinese character
standard form (of a Chinese character)/plain font style (as opposed to bold or italic)/printed style (as opposed to cursive)/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
loanword
Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
reading or phonetic value of a character
official language
the common use romanization system introduced in Taiwan in 2003
